info.description: Api Rest pour le stockage et la restitution de fichier CSV
info.title: ore-si-ng

defaultValue.description: The value by default if the variable component is empty after migration

defaultLanguage.description: The default language if none is provided

internationalizationName.description: How to translate this name in differents locales

internationalizedColumns.description: Some columns used as key and the reference to translation in other columns

name.description: The unique name of the application

version.description: The version incremental version number of this yaml description of this application

authorizationScopes.description: A list of authorization scopes. An authorization scope is for example the location, the project, or both.

dataGroups.description: The list of 'data groups'. Each data group contains variables. People will be given a right on one or more data-group.

timeScope.description: The variable component that identifies the time scope of the line (must be a variable/component with a checker of type 'Date')

component.description: This autorization scope is defined by a variable/component, this is the component name

internationalizationName.description: How to translate this name in differents locales

internationalizedColumns.description: Some columns used as key and the reference to translation in other columns

variable.description: This autorization scope is defined by a variable/component, this is the variable name

duration.description: the duration of the data value. Use sql pattern duration.

groovy.description: A groovy expression to check for the GroovyExpression checker

multiplicity.description: If MANY the value is a list of references for Reference checker

pattern.description:
The pattern of a regular expression for RegularExpression checker
the pattern of a date for Date checker

refType.description: the name of the reference for Reference checker

required.description: If true the value can't be null

transformation.description: How to transform the value before checking it

name.description: The name of the checker that must be used

params.description: The params of the checker to configure it. Required for some checkers

boundTo.description: The variable/component to bind to. The content of the cell from the CSV will be pushed in this variable/component

header.description: The header name of column that contains the value to bind

internationalizationName.description: How to translate this name in differents locales

internationalizedColumns.description: Some columns used as key and the reference to translation in other columns

parentKeyColumn.description: The column of 'reference' where we can find the natural key the find the parent for this line

parentRecursiveKey.description: For recursive composite reference: the reference column that contains parent key

reference.description: A reference composing the composite reference

components.description: A 'composite reference' is a hierarchy of references from largest entity to the smallest

internationalizationName.description: How to translate this name in differents locales

internationalizedColumns.description: Some columns used as key and the reference to translation in other columns

computation.description: Explain how to compute the value for this computed component given other columns

compositeReferences.description:
A composite reference allows you to link references according to an ''is in'' link. For example between a city and country reference.
You can define several composite references, and a composite reference can contain only one reference or contain a recursion.
All references used in a datatype.authorization.authorizationscope section must be composite.

dataTypes.description: A data type describes a set of data representing a cohesive set of measurements or observations. (values can be stored in one csv file format).

references.description: A list of references indexed by name. A reference is used to describe other references or data..

version.description: The version number of the yaml schema used to read the deposited yaml

data.description: The list of variables in this data group

internationalizationName.description: How to translate this name in differents locales

internationalizedColumns.description: Some columns used as key and the reference to translation in other columns

label.description: The name of the data group

authorization.description: This section defines the autorization model for this dataType, how we define who can access what

data.description: This section describes the data model, splitting each line of data in variable/components

format.description: This section describes a binding between a file and the data

internationalizationName.description: How to translate this name in differents locales

internationalizedColumns.description: Some columns used as key and the reference to translation in other columns

migrations.description: This section defines how to migrate the data when a new version of yaml is registered

repository.description: If this section exists, the data file will be store on a repository tree

uniqueness.description: This section defines the variable/components that compose the natural key of a line

validations.description: Some validations rules that will be checked at import. It will allow to make sure a line we import is consistent.

columns.description: The description for binding columns content to variable/components

constants.description: The description of some values in header to bind to variable component

firstRowLine.description: The number of the line that contain the first row of data

repeatedColumns.description: The description of repeated colulmns patterns and their binding to variable/components

columnNumber.description: The column where is the constant value. If empty, 'headerName' must be provided

headerName.description: The header column name of column where is the constant value. If empty, 'columnNumber' must be provided

rowNumber.description: The row where is the constant value

boundTo.description: The variable/component to bind to. The content of the cell from the CSV will be pushed in this variable/component

exportHeader.description: When this data will be exported as CSV, the header of the column that will contain the value

pattern.description: pattern in differents locales, used to display a reference when referred to

application.description: The internationalization description from section Application

dataTypes.description: The internationalization description from section dataTypes

references.description: The internationalization description from section references

checker.description: The checker to apply to ensure that the rule is respected

columns.description: The set of columns to check

internationalizationName.description: How to translate this name in differents locales

internationalizedColumns.description: Some columns used as key and the reference to translation in other columns

checker.description: The checker to apply to ensure that the rule is respected

internationalizationName.description: How to translate this name in differents locales

internationalizedColumns.description: Some columns used as key and the reference to translation in other columns

components.description: A list of component migration description for this variable

variable.description: A variable in this data group

computedColumns.description: The list of computed columns descriptions. Computed columns are not provided in the CSV but computed line by line when importing.

dynamicColumns.description: The list of dynamic columns descriptions. Dynamic columns names refers to an other reference.

internationalizationName.description: How to translate this name in differents locales

internationalizedColumns.description: Some columns used as key and the reference to translation in other columns

keyColumns.description: The list of columns composing the natural key of a row.

validations.description: The list of validations to perform on this reference.

headerPrefix.description: The header prefix. All columns that starts with this prefix use this description

presenceConstraint.description: If the column is mandatory or not

reference.description: The reference that contains the column names

referenceColumnToLookForHeader.description: The column in 'reference' that contains the column names

checker.description: Define a checker to apply for this column on each line of the CSV at import

computation.description: Explain how to compute the value for this column given other columns

presenceConstraint.description: If the column is mandatory or not

checker.description: Define a checker to apply for this column on each line of the CSV at import

defaultValue.description: Define a default value for this column: it will be computed if the CSV contains an empty cell

presenceConstraint.description: If the column is mandatory or not

boundTo.description: The variable/component to bind to. The content of the cell from the CSV will be pushed in this variable/component

exportHeader.description: The export header (for value) of these columns

headerPattern.description: The regexp pattern to find repeated columns to bind

tokens.description: How bind the result of regexp parenthesis. $1 to first pattern, $2 is the second ...

codify.description: If true, codifies the column value. The value will be escaped to a format suitable for a naturel key. Will be applied after 'groovy' expression if both are active.

groovy.description: A groovy expression to transform the value before the checker checks it

defaultValue.description: A default value if the cell in the imported CSV is empty

chartDescription.description: A description to create disponibilit charts

components.description: The list of components for this variable

computedComponents.description: The list of computed components for this variable
